first_translate: a few days later...
the duchy of halyon
I can’t go around with his grace anymore...

hangle: 같이 이곳저곳 다니다 보면 꼭 시비가 걸리는데,
first_translate: every time we do, I get into trouble.
this place is like a pigsty.
but I didn’t know people actually lived here.
that was really mean-spirited.
still,
if abel wasn’t that way,
halyon wouldn’t have survived until now.
that’s true, but still...
chuckle
at least you’re willing to admit my good qualities!
good girl.
yikes!!
don’t be surprised.
since we decided on dating,

hangle: 앞으로 네가 떠먹여 주는 건 다 받아먹을 생각이거든.
first_translate: from now on, I’m going to take everything you give me.
w-when did I ever offer anything...?
your highness!
it looks like your tracking skills are quite impressive.
who is this?
the guy I told you about before.

hangle: 에레즈 후작이 내 궁에 밀어 넣은 인간.
first_translate: marquess ereze sent him to work at the palace.
cain ereze.
I’ve been looking everywhere for you!

hangle: 제발 제가 호위를 맡을 때마다 절 따돌리는 건 그만해주세요.
first_translate: please stop avoiding me every time I escort you.
oh.
is someone else there too?
my apologies.
fiona halyon.
I don’t need any escorts.
now if you’ll excuse us.
then why...

hangle: 왜 제가 담당일 때만 필요가 없어지시는 겁니까?
first_translate: why does she only say that when I’m her guard?
let’s leave then, lady fiona.
th-the crown prince?

hangle: 따박따박한 걸 보니 시그렌과 쿵짝이 잘 맞을 수도 있을 것 같아.
first_translate: judging by how precise they both are, maybe sieg will suit her well.

hangle: 에레즈 가문 사람만 아니었다면 좋았을 텐데.
first_translate: too bad he’s from house ereze though.
we aren’t romeo and juliet or something.
can’t they become friends just because their families hate each other?
stop thinking weird things again.
lady fiona.
his grace wants to see you.
pardon?
you’re returning to halyon?
yes.
has something happened back home?
not exactly,
but jeron might die soon.
or else I swear I’m gonna kill him myself one day!

hangle: 서류를 처리하던 나와 아벨이 없으니 괴롭긴 하겠지…
first_translate: without abel and me doing all the paperwork, it must be hard on them...

hangle: 어차피 너무 오랫동안 영지를 비워두기도 했고,
first_translate: and besides, I left the territory unattended for far too long already.
it’s probably time I went back.
but once I return to halyon,
several men will try to attack sieg and fiona.

hangle: 시그렌과 피오나를 노릴 인간이 한둘이 아닐 거다.
first_translate: several men will try to attack sieg and fiona.

hangle: 내가 살아 있는 동안 황태자 놈이 황제 되는 꼴은 못 보는데.
first_translate: as long as I live, I won’t let that stupid crown prince ascend to the throne.

hangle: 안 그래도 어둠이 나타나면서 마물의 공세가 거세졌는데,
first_translate: on top of that, since darkness has appeared, demonic attacks have gotten worse.

hangle: 멍청한 황태자가 황제가 되면 제대로 대책을 세울 것 같지도 않다.
first_translate: if that idiot becomes emperor, I doubt he’d come up with proper countermeasures against these monsters.

hangle: 그러면 피해를 떠안는 건 최전선인 헤일론이다.
first_translate: in which case, halyon would suffer greatly being on the front lines.
and not to mention, he’ll oppress those living in the north even more.

hangle: 이 이상 멍청한 놈 때문에 영지가 망하는 꼴을 두고 볼 생각은 없어.
first_translate: I refuse to watch our land fall apart due to some fool.
then why bring sieg to the capital in the first place?
your grace?
I wonder if it’ll be alright without you here.
me too.
I worry about what could happen between you two.
wait, were you worried about that right now?
of course.
haaah...
really, father...
both of you are adults anyway.
what happens after doesn’t matter either.
snicker
but fathers tend to fret over such matters.

hangle: 나 없다고 둘이 쓸데없는 짓 하지 말거라.
first_translate: while I’m away, make sure nothing unnecessary happens between you two.

hangle: 내 눈에 흙이 들어가기 전까지는 안 된다.
first_translate: until dirt covers my eyes, no funny business allowed.

hangle: 조만간 진짜로 그놈의 흙, 뿌려버릴 거예요…
first_translate: I swear, I’m seriously considering burying you under a pile of dirt someday...
ooh.
it feels kind of deserted out here.
since his grace returned to halyon so suddenly,

hangle: 그동안 아가씨 몸에 생채기라도 나면 저희가 죽겠군요.
first_translate: we’ll lose our heads if anything happens to you while he’s gone.

hangle: 설마 헤일론에서처럼 막무가내로 돌아다니실 건 아니겠죠?
first_translate: so please tell me you won’t run wild like you used to back in halyon.
wait, when did I ever do that?

hangle: 제 기억으로는 2, 4 성벽의 용병과 병사들을 쥐 잡듯이 잡으셨는걸요?
first_translate: wasn’t it during the second and fourth fortresses where you slaughtered soldiers and mercenaries like rats?
um...
that was merely establishing order.
back then, you were amazing, miss fiona.

hangle: 귀여운 여자애가 싱글싱글 웃으면서 커다란 남자들을 휘어잡는 모습이란!
first_translate: an adorable little woman smiling brightly while controlling big burly men!
did I really do that?
n-no offense meant, miss fiona.

hangle: 오히려 그 모습에 반한 놈들도 있으니까요.
first_translate: rather, several guys fell head over heels for you upon seeing that side of yours.
fall head over heels...?
truly.
for example, one of my friends--
sir isaac?
someone is approaching.
sh*t!

hangle: 아가씨, 절대 마차 밖으로 나오지 마세요!
first_translate: miss fiona, whatever you do, stay inside the carriage!
there are suspicious-looking men outside!
they’re attacking us!
